channel.title: drought sensitivity on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in drought sensitivity on funPlantGenes

item.title: ARGOS8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb287000 Gene Symbol: ARGOS8 Gene Name: Zea mays ARGOS8 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CaAIRE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA05g17640 Gene Symbol: CaAIRE1 Gene Name: ABA Induced RING-type E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper E3 ligase CaAIRE1 promotes ABA sensitivity and drought tolerance by degradation of protein phosphatase CaAITP1.

item.title: CaCIPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA01g29520 Gene Symbol: CaCIPK3 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 3 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The CaCIPK3 gene positively regulates drought tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CaHDZ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaHDZ12 Gene Name: Homeodomain-Leucine Zipper (HD-Zip) I Transcription Factor12 Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: Chickpea WRKY70 Regulates the Expression of a Homeodomain-Leucine Zipper (HD-Zip) I Transcription Factor CaHDZ12, which Confers Abiotic Stress Tolerance in Transgenic Tobacco and Chickpea.

item.title: CsATAF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4M361820.1 Gene Symbol: CsATAF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsATAF1 Positively Regulates Drought Stress Tolerance by an ABA-Dependent Pathway and by Promoting ROS Scavenging in Cucumber.

item.title: DST;WL1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g57240 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0786400 Gene Symbol: DST WL1 HST1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GF14b;OsGF14b
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g38870 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0462500 Gene Symbol: GF14b OsGF14b Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GhMKK5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK5 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase5 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhMKK5 affects disease resistance, induces HR-like cell death, and reduces the tolerance to salt and drought stress in transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: GmPLATZ17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G063200 Gene Symbol: GmPLATZ17 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean PLATZ transcription factor GmPLATZ17 suppresses drought tolerance by interfering with stress-associated gene regulation of GmDREB5.

item.title: IbLEA14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbLEA14 Gene Name: Late embryogenesis abundant 14 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: Sweetpotato late embryogenesis abundant 14 (IbLEA14) gene influences lignification and increases osmotic- and salt stress-tolerance of transgenic calli.

item.title: LP2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g40240 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0615800 Gene Symbol: LP2 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: MdARF17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdARF17 Gene Name: Auxin Response Factor 17 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Using stable transgenic plants, we found that drought tolerance was improved by higher levels of Mdm-miR160 or MdHYL1 and by decreased levels of MdARF17, whereas reductions in MdHYL1 or increases in MdARF17 led to greater drought sensitivity.

item.title: MdSAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdSAT1 encodes a bHLHm1 transcription factor involved in salinity and drought responses.

item.title: MdSHINE2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000178263 Gene Symbol: MdSHINE2 Gene Name: AP2/EREBP transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple AP2/EREBP transcription factor MdSHINE2 confers drought resistance by regulating wax biosynthesis.

item.title: MeCatalase1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.05G130500 Gene Symbol: MeCatalase1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The chaperone MeHSP90 recruits MeWRKY20 and MeCatalase1 to regulate drought stress resistance in cassava.

item.title: MeWRKY20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.15G118300 Gene Symbol: MeWRKY20 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The chaperone MeHSP90 recruits MeWRKY20 and MeCatalase1 to regulate drought stress resistance in cassava.

item.title: OsMYB60
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os12g03150 RAPdb gene ID: Os12g0125000 Gene Symbol: OsMYB60 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g44060 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0521100 Gene Symbol: OsPIP2 3 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g21040 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0327600 Gene Symbol: Osr40c1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsWRKY114
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: None RAPdb gene ID: Os12g0116100 Gene Symbol: OsWRKY114 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PbrMYB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr028812.1 Gene Symbol: PbrMYB21 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 21 Genome: Species: Pyrus betulaefolia Functional Descriptions: PbrMYB21, a novel MYB protein of Pyrus betulaefolia, functions in drought tolerance and modulates polyamine levels by regulating arginine decarboxylase gene.

item.title: SlNPR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlNPR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: CRISPR/Cas9-Mediated SlNPR1 mutagenesis reduces tomato plant drought tolerance.

item.title: SlUGT75C1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g092500 Gene Symbol: SlUGT75C1 Gene Name: UDP-glycosyltransferase 75C1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlUGT75C1 catalyzes the glucosylation of both ABA and IAA in vitro| SlUGT76E1 can only catalyze the conjugation of ABA| and SlUGT73C4 cannot glycosylate either ABA or IAA.

item.title: TaCIPK23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCIPK23 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 23 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat CBL-interacting protein kinase 23 (TaCIPK23) positively regulates drought stress and ABA responses TaCIPK23-overexpression wheat and Arabidopsis showed an higher survival rate under drought conditions with enhanced germination rate, developed root system, increased accumulation of osmolytes, and reduced water loss rate.

item.title: TaNAC48
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS1B02G274300 Gene Symbol: TaNAC48 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaNAC48 positively regulates drought tolerance and ABA responses in wheat (Triticum aestivum L.
